hedline.hl1: Through the Electronic Lion Gates to the Foods of Asia

abstract.p: Asia Society establishes food web site (S)

block.p: The best Web sites that sell food products deliver solid information along with them, and the new site established by the Asia Society, www.asiafood.org, is a prime example. Among the products for sale are spice pastes, noodles, rice and condiments suitable for most Asian cuisines, as well as for Persian and Australian cooking. But even better, the site has recipes galore and links to resources like a fairly thorough glossary of Asian food terms, from Charlaine Solomon's Encyclopedia of Asian Food.
